name: daos
servers:
- rank: 0
  cpus:
  - 1-8
  fabric_iface: eth0
  fabric_iface_port: 31416
  log_mask: ERR
  log_file: /tmp/server.log
  env_vars:
  - DAOS_MD_CAP=1024
  - CRT_TIMEOUT=30
  - FI_SOCKETS_MAX_CONN_RETRY=1
  - FI_SOCKETS_CONN_TIMEOUT=2000
  scm_mount: /mnt/daos/1
  bdev_class: thrash
  bdev_list:
  - /tmp/daos-bdev
  bdev_number: 0
  bdev_size: 16
provider: ofi+sockets
socket_dir: /tmp/daos_sockets
access_points:
- localhost
port: 10001
ca_cert: ""
cert: ./.daos/daos_server.crt
key: ./.daos/daos_server.key
fault_path: ""
fault_cb: ""
fabric_ifaces: []
scm_mount_path: /mnt/daos
bdev_include: []
bdev_exclude: []
hyperthreads: false
